"To sum it all up, the last five months, have been delayed gratification," Michael Vick said. Things that I wanted to accomplish the last couple years that I couldn't and I had to wait for it, and I had to be patient, and I did it and it all paid off. I just thank God for putting me with the right group of people, with Andy, with a flagship organization, a great group of coaches.... They give me all the credit, but I give them the credit. Mike Pence , considered by some a possible GOP Presidential candidate in 2012, has ruled out a run for the White House. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters first reported Thursday by the Indianapolis Star. "We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012." The Washington Post>>>

To win this game was big for us http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_55_pts_Playoff_Career_High_vs_NO_Hornets_2003 Philadelphia 98, New Orleans 90 Allen Iverson 's 55 Gives Sixers Game 1 In the illustious history of the Philadelphia 76ers, nobody-- not Wilt, not Julius Erving , not Moses-- had an individual performance like Allen Iverson 's against the New Orleans Hornets. Allen Iverson scored a team playoff-record 55 points as the 76ers defeated the Hornets, 98-90, in Game One of their Eastern Conference first-round series. "He was on fire, Hornets coach Paul Silas said of Allen Iverson , who fell eight points shy of Michael Jordan 's NBA playoff record set exactly 17 years ago in a double-overtime loss at Boston. "The heart-breaking thing with respect to Guantanamo is not that there's anything wrong with it, it's one of the finest prison systems in the world," said Donald Rumsfeld . What's awkward is the fact that, for whatever reason, the administration was incapable of persuading people that that was a first-class operation, that they were not torturing people, that they were not hurting people, he said. Factor is well supported on both sides of the border. "I know from my experience of the Young Star Search there is no shortage of talent in Northern Ireland," he said. There will potentially be no representation from Ireland, north or south, which is a bit rich given how loyal people here are to the show. Simon Cowell has made no secret of the fact that he was underwhelmed by what Dublin had to offer- and it is believed to be under his orders that X Factor has axed the Irish leg.

Muglia is just the latest in a raft of executive departures from Microsoft. In October 2010, Steve Ballmer announced the resignation of Chief Software Architect Ray Ozzie , who had helped shape the company's cloud strategy. The CSA role was unique, and I won't refill the role after Ray Ozzie 's departure, Steve Ballmer wrote in an Oct. 18 e-mail to the company.
